com.barrybecker4.common.geometry
Class Box

java.lang.Object
  com.barrybecker4.common.geometry.Box

public class Box
extends java.lang.Object

A box defined by 2 locations. The coordinates have the resolution of integers.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a box with dimensions of oldBox, but expanded by the specified point

expandGloballyBy

public void expandGloballyBy(int amount,
                             int maxRow,
                             int maxCol)
Parameters:
amount - amount to expand all borders of the box by.
maxRow - don't go further than this though.
maxCol - don't go further than this though.

expandBordersToEdge

public void expandBordersToEdge(int threshold,
                                int maxRow,
                                int maxCol)
Parameters:
threshold - if withing this distance to the edge, extend the box all the way to that edge.
maxRow - don't go further than this though.
maxCol - don't go further than this though.
